content.metaTitle: Chalet MIR0054: Luxury New Build Villa Jávea / Xàbia
content.metaDescription: Spectacular frontline villa MIR0054 in prestigious Portichol, Jávea. 4 beds, infinity pool, private spa, panoramic sea views. Price on request.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Chalet MIR0054, an extraordinary frontline villa positioned on a magnificent 1,920m² plot in the exclusive Portichol - Balcón al Mar area of Jávea. This architectural masterpiece by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana offers unparalleled south-facing sea views across the Mediterranean, creating a living experience that epitomizes luxury coastal living on the Costa Blanca.

Designed with meticulous attention to detail, this modern villa spans 371m² of sophisticated living space complemented by 236m² of expansive terraces. From the moment you enter through the welcoming hall with its breathtaking sea vistas, every element has been crafted to maximize the spectacular coastal setting. The property features a private spa with heated indoor pool, a stunning 70m² infinity pool, and elevator access throughout, making this one of Jávea's most prestigious residential offerings.

locationSection.intro:
Portichol - Balcón al Mar represents the pinnacle of prestigious coastal living in Jávea, offering an exclusive enclave where luxury meets natural beauty. This coveted area is renowned for its elevated position providing unobstructed Mediterranean views, while maintaining convenient access to Jávea's pristine beaches, world-class restaurants, and vibrant town center. The location perfectly balances tranquil residential privacy with the sophisticated amenities that make Jávea one of Spain's most sought-after destinations.

Jávea itself stands as the jewel of the Costa Blanca, attracting discerning international buyers seeking year-round sunshine, exceptional quality of life, and strong property investment potential. The town's unique microclimate, protected by the Montgó Natural Park, ensures over 300 days of sunshine annually, while its diverse landscape encompasses everything from dramatic cliffs to secluded coves and the famous Arenal beach.
highlights: Exclusive Portichol area with frontline sea views and premium neighborhood prestige
Just minutes from Jávea's golden Arenal beach and picturesque old town
Protected location within Montgó Natural Park ensuring unspoiled natural surroundings
Easy access to world-class marinas at Jávea port and nearby Dénia
Prime Costa Blanca location between Valencia and Alicante airports

propertyFeatures.intro: Chalet MIR0054 exemplifies contemporary luxury living with its thoughtfully designed three-level layout, premium finishes, and cutting-edge amenities that cater to the most discerning buyers seeking an exceptional coastal lifestyle.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms with 6 bathrooms including en-suite facilities throughout
Spectacular 70m² infinity pool with seamless Mediterranean views
Private spa sanctuary featuring heated indoor pool and complete wellness facilities
Elegant open-plan living areas with large kitchen island and premium appliances
Convenient elevator access connecting all floors for effortless mobility
Expansive 236m² of terraces perfect for entertaining and outdoor dining
Secure parking for two vehicles with additional guest parking options
Advanced home automation including automatic blinds and climate control
High-end security systems with interior alarm and access control technology
Double-glazed windows and superior insulation for year-round comfort

content.investmentSection:
The Jávea property market continues to demonstrate exceptional resilience and growth, with luxury villas in prime locations like Portichol commanding premium prices and strong rental yields. International demand for high-end coastal properties in this exclusive area has driven consistent capital appreciation, making Chalet MIR0054 an outstanding investment opportunity. The combination of limited frontline availability, prestigious location, and world-class amenities positions this property for continued value growth.

Rental potential in Jávea's luxury market is particularly strong, with premium villas achieving impressive seasonal rates from affluent international visitors seeking authentic Costa Blanca experiences. Properties of this caliber in Portichol regularly command top-tier rental returns, while the year-round appeal of Jávea's climate and amenities ensures consistent demand across multiple seasons, providing investors with both immediate income potential and long-term capital growth prospects.
whyBuySection: Irreplaceable frontline position with unobstructed Mediterranean sea views in prestigious Portichol
Exceptional build quality by renowned Miralbo Urbana with premium materials and finishes throughout
Comprehensive luxury amenities including private spa, infinity pool, and elevator access

faqs.question: What is the asking price for Chalet MIR0054 and what payment options are available?
faqs.answer: The price for Chalet MIR0054 is available on request due to the bespoke nature and premium location of this exceptional property. Miralbo Urbana offers flexible payment structures typically including staged payments during construction. We can also arrange mortgage financing through our Habeno partnership for qualified international buyers.

faqs.question: What makes the Portichol - Balcón al Mar location so special in Jávea?
faqs.answer: Portichol represents Jávea's most exclusive residential area, offering frontline sea positions with unobstructed Mediterranean views. The elevated location provides privacy and prestige while remaining just minutes from Jávea's beaches, restaurants, and amenities. This area is highly coveted due to limited development opportunities and protected natural surroundings.

faqs.question: Can international buyers easily purchase this property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, international buyers can freely purchase Spanish property with no restrictions. We provide comprehensive support throughout the buying process including legal assistance, tax guidance, and NIE number acquisition. Our experienced team ensures a smooth transaction from initial viewing through to completion and key handover.

faqs.question: Is mortgage financing available for this luxury villa purchase?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We work with Habeno, specialist international mortgage brokers, who can arrange financing up to 70% of the property value for non-resident buyers. Spanish mortgage rates are currently very competitive, and we can connect you directly with our mortgage specialists to discuss your financing options.

faqs.question: What rental income potential does this property offer?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Portichol command premium rental rates, particularly during peak season from May through October. Properties of this caliber typically achieve excellent returns through high-end vacation rentals, with annual yields often exceeding 6% for well-managed properties. The private spa and infinity pool are particularly attractive to luxury rental guests.

faqs.question: When will Chalet MIR0054 be completed and available?
faqs.answer: As this is a new build project by Miralbo Urbana, completion timelines depend on the finalization of design specifications and construction commencement. Typically, luxury villas of this scope require 12-18 months from groundbreaking to completion. We can provide detailed construction schedules upon serious inquiry.

faqs.question: What premium features and finishes are included in the villa?
faqs.answer: Chalet MIR0054 comes fully equipped with automatic blinds, comprehensive air conditioning, double-glazed windows, security systems, and elevator access. The kitchen features premium appliances and the spa includes a heated indoor pool. All bathrooms are fitted with luxury fixtures and the property includes landscaped gardens and outdoor lighting.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of this exclusive property?
faqs.answer: We can arrange exclusive viewings of the plot location and similar completed Miralbo properties to showcase build quality and finishes. Contact us via WhatsApp, phone, or email to schedule your private appointment. We also offer virtual consultations and can provide detailed architectural plans and 3D renderings.

faqs.question: Can the villa design be customized to personal preferences?
faqs.answer: Yes, one of the key advantages of Chalet MIR0054 is the ability to customize finishes, layouts, and specific features to create your perfect coastal home. Miralbo Urbana works closely with clients to incorporate personal preferences while maintaining the architectural integrity and luxury standards. Customization options should be discussed early in the purchase process.

faqs.question: What ongoing costs should I expect for this luxury property?
faqs.answer: Annual costs typically include property taxes (IBI), community fees if applicable, insurance, and maintenance. For a property of this value, annual holding costs generally range from 1-2% of property value. The advanced systems and pool require professional maintenance, which we can arrange through trusted local service providers.

content.conclusion: Chalet MIR0054 represents a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to secure a prestigious frontline villa in Jávea's most coveted location. With its exceptional design, world-class amenities, and unparalleled sea views, this property offers the perfect blend of luxury living and investment potential on the Costa Blanca. Don't miss your chance to own this architectural masterpiece – contact us today via WhatsApp at +34 634 044 970 or through our website to arrange your exclusive viewing and begin your journey to owning paradise in Portichol.
